question.title: Can't resolve "module not found org.testfx, org.testfx.junit5" in gradle based Java project using JavaFX/TestFX
question.body:
I'm fairly new to java especially testing. I'm working on a JavaFX/FXML based project and trying to test my controllers like login etc with TestFX. I've setup dependencies in build.gradle like this:

dependencies {
    implementation('org.controlsfx:controlsfx:11.2.1')
    implementation('com.dlsc.formsfx:formsfx-core:11.6.0') {
        exclude(group: 'org.openjfx')
    }
    implementation('net.synedra:validatorfx:0.5.0') {
        exclude(group: 'org.openjfx')
    }
    implementation('org.kordamp.ikonli:ikonli-javafx:12.3.1')
    implementation('org.kordamp.bootstrapfx:bootstrapfx-core:0.4.0')
    implementation('eu.hansolo:tilesfx:21.0.3') {
        exclude(group: 'org.openjfx')
    }

    testImplementation("org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-api:${junitVersion}")
    testRuntimeOnly("org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter-engine:${junitVersion}")

    testImplementation("org.testfx:testfx-core:4.0.17")
    testImplementation("org.testfx:testfx-junit5:4.0.17")
}

Inside the src/main/java/org.example.swm/module-info.java I've got my necessary exports and requires in this manner:

module org.example.swm {
    requires javafx.controls;
    requires javafx.fxml;
    requires javafx.web;
    requires org.testfx;
    requires org.testfx.junit5;

    requires org.controlsfx.controls;
    requires com.dlsc.formsfx;
    requires net.synedra.validatorfx;
    requires org.kordamp.ikonli.javafx;
    requires org.kordamp.bootstrapfx.core;
    requires eu.hansolo.tilesfx;

    opens org.example.swm.controllers to javafx.fxml, org.testfx, org.testfx.junit5;
    exports org.example.swm;
}

The error "module not found" shows up on the requires org.testfx and requires org.testfx.junit5 lines.

All my tests are in the src/test/java/org.example.swm where there is no module-info.java.

I've tried invalidating caches in IntelliJ but that hasn't fixed the error. An example test file looks like this:

package org.example.swm.controllers;

import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
import javafx.scene.Scene;
import javafx.stage.Stage;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtendWith;
import org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationExtension;
import org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationTest;

@ExtendWith(ApplicationExtension.class)
public class LoginControllerTest extends ApplicationTest {}
